content: Once you defeat this frog boss, he’ll drop the Evil Repelling Medicament formula. Return it to the Xu dog back outside the pit. Not only will he reward you with 2 Evil Repelling Medicament for your trouble, but you’ll also unlock the ability to create all sorts of consumables yourself at any Shrine. With all the materials you’ve been harvesting, you can stock up on defensive, offensive, and status reducing consumables.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Lang-Li-Guhh-Baw.md', within the main section titled 'Lang-Li-Guhh-Baw', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Lang-Li-Guhh-Baw' and the sub-subsection 'Lang-Li-Guhh-Baw Mini-Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Once you defeat this frog boss, he’ll drop the Evil Repelling Medicament formula. Return it to the Xu dog back outside the pit. Not only will he reward you with 2 Evil Repelling Medicament for your trouble, but you’ll also unlock the ability to create all sorts of consumables yourself at any Shrine. With all the materials you’ve been harvesting, you can stock up on defensive, offensive, and status reducing consumables.
